relationships.description: Close friend and business contact in aircraft market

analysis.purpose: To discuss off-market Gulfstream V aircraft availability and avoid stepping on colleague's toes

analysis.summary: Eric Roth emails Jeffrey Epstein about off-market Gulfstream V aircraft availability, carefully noting he doesn't want to bypass their mutual contact Shawn Lancaster, and references his contact's previous successful sale of Donald Trump's 727 aircraft.
